channel.title: Exabuster
channel.description: A Github Actions static-site generator for Ghost

item.title: Exabuster
item.description: Exabuster is the Github Actions version of Buster, the bruteforce static site generator for Ghost. Exabuster is still a work-in-progress.
item.dc:creator: zalo
item.content:encoded:
Exabuster is the Github Actions version of Buster, the bruteforce static site generator for Ghost.  Exabuster is still a work-in-progress, and not even close to done; use Buster instead!

Eventually Exabuster might allow one to bake out Ghost Blogs for Github Pages via Github Actions.
